attributes.action: House the homeless Ex Armed forces first
attributes.background: there is a horrible amount of ex service personnel who we have forgotten to look after once they leave the armed forces. Many are having to sleep on the streets because once they have finished their career they have no home to go to. Councils will not help as they have not been evicted.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107924

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
